div.p: The Mercado Latino is in an area where there are many Chicanos. And now that there is a palce where the Latinos can buy their authentic food and be surrounded by people from their same ethnicity a lot more Chicanos will be moving to the area. There will be an increase of Latinos in this specific area of Baldwin Park. The Latinos will be making their community like their hometown. That way they would feel more comfortable of being in the United States, since they have made this suburb their new home.

note.p: The Latinos in Baldwin Park have made it their home by having Mercado Latino in their community.

listBibl.bibl: Google Images. Mercado Latino Inc. 2016. Photograph. Baldwin Park, CA.
